string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: How much would you enjoy engaging in the following activities?\n 1. Supervise a machine assembling washing machines
2. Sell a real estate
3. Farm prawns
4. Act in an amateur theatre
5. Research effective ways to prevent animal diseases
6. Lay tiles in your kitchen
7. Calculate the infection rate of a new disease
8. Run a sport training for teenagers
9. Develop an Excel sheet to track your tax returns
10. Sell tickets to alternative music concerts
11. Generate the monthly expenses summaries for a company
12. Study the philosophical background of political movements
13. Edit photos on a computer
14. Repair cars
15. Diagnose and treat cancer patients
16. Help handicapped people with their daily activities
17. Manage e-mails distribution in a global company
18. Buy and sell financial products on the stock exchange
19. Conduct physical experiments in the laboratory
20. Perform a stand-up comedy
21. Build a walk-in-wardrobe
22. Teach a class in the primary school
23. Transfer funds between banks according to guidelines
24. Record own song
25. Organize and schedule training events
26. Critically review movies
27. Guard a jewellery shop
28. Develop a new psychological treatment for depression
29. Give a presentation to convince the audience to invest in your idea
30. Facilitate counselling sessions for students
31. Manage an airport
32. Help people with substance abuse issues
33. Dance in a musical
34. Edit and format a book before printing
35. Drive Uber
36. Run a physical rehabilitation session
37. Manage the operations of a medium-sized supermarket
38. Sort and archive confidential documents
39. Volunteer to help elderly in your neighbourhood
40. Perform as a stuntman in the action movie
41. Study the factors modulating immune response to allergens
42. Organise leisure time activities for tourists
43. Run a groceries store
44. Run statistical analysis of a provided data set
45. Compose a new ringtone for a smartphoneâ€™s producer
46. Paint walls in a hotel
47. Conduct research of a soil sample to track pollution level
48. Sell perfumes on fashion shows

resources.string: How much would you enjoy engaging in the following activities?
